rank: #1 in Best Liberal Arts Colleges in America
description:
editorial
Harvey Mudd is a highly rated private college located in Claremont, California in the Los Angeles Area. It is a small institution with an enrollment of 906 undergraduate students. Admissions is extremely competitive as the Harvey Mudd acceptance rate is 13%. Popular majors include Computational and Applied Mathematics, Engineering, and Computer Science. Graduating 92% of students, Harvey Mudd alumni go on to earn a starting salary of $72,500.
